scripts.info: IMPORTANT NOTE: Please make sure to replace any harcoded region and AWS account ID
scripts.service:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.todoapp.cdk.ServiceApp" -c springProfile=aws -c dockerImageUrl=docker.io/stratospheric/todo-app-v1:latest --require-approval never
scripts.service:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.todoapp.cdk.ServiceApp" -c springProfile=aws -c dockerImageUrl=docker.io/stratospheric/todo-app-v1:latest --force --require-approval never
